post.body: What the fuck?
Aww
The idea is you put stuff in it and start it in the morning so that its done at night :p Cousin got a rice cooker.
You would...
Awwwww :)
Someone belittling your craft, eh? :p <3
Yeah. Spam his ass :p
Now he does :p I did it for him using his phone. Magical :D
hes turning on notifications, he had the same problem you did :p
My dad is giving Justin a guitar lesson :3
My dad and grandfather have the same exact nose. I think I have it too.
omg, my mom introduced my married, older semi-cousin and her friend to my grandmother as partners xD
can't believe my cats and dog are almost 10 years old...
Wow. My dad shot holes into stuff as a little kid and his parents never found out until now.
Got a slow cooker from my aunt. She must know that I have no time to cook anymore :)
Oh god, Alice likes Twilight and is trying to defend it to me. I want to snap her neck.
Woo, liverwurst :D
Omg loose leaf tea for my mom, Bob Dylan song book for my dad. Nothing for my brother since hes a tool and I'm broke.
Haet you all...
I dropped my phone and the outer screen is now white :| I am genius...
